Added strict 'Sale Date' validation (skip if empty/false) to ignore unsold stock
Implemented specific 'Output Type' mapping (CO, Full Exchange, Saleout, SO Return) from detail file
Refined Report Period to use Date Range from all Sales Data and corrected '1st-of-month' display issue

decisions_made.decision: Use Output Type from Detail File
decisions_made.reason: More accurate than inferring from Sales Data for mistake categorization.
To filter out unsold/stock items from being counted as mistakes.

decisions_made.decision: Display Date Range from Sales Data
decisions_made.reason: To show the full report coverage period (e.g., 1-31 Jan) rather than just the mistake occurrence range.
